saao/saa15/P313515
a-na LUGAL be-li₂-ia ARAD-ka {1}MAN-IGI.LAL-an-ni lu-u DI-mu a-na LUGAL be-li₂-ia₂ {1}{d}PA-APIN-eš PAB-šu₂ ša {1}{d}PA-ZU šu-u₂ u₃ 15 {LU₂}DUMU-MEŠ-BAR₂.SIPA{KI} is-se-e-šu₂ UD 14-KAM₂ ša {ITI}ZIZ₂ a-na {URU}si-pur ina pa-ne₂-e-a it-tal-ku-nu šu₂-nu a-na E₂.GAL ša {URU}NINA la ih-ru-pu la il-lik-u-ni x x-MEŠ {LU₂}x x x x x x x x x x x u₂-ma-a an-nu-rig ina E₂.GAL o lil-lik-u-ne₂-e
